name: INAddTasksIntent
desc: A request to add tasks to an existing task list.

items.name: init(targetTaskList: INTaskList?, taskTitles: [INSpeakableString]?, spatialEventTrigger: INSpatialEventTrigger?, temporalEventTrigger: INTemporalEventTrigger?, priority: INTaskPriority)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with the specified task details.

items.name: var targetTaskList: INTaskList?
items.desc: The task list to receive the new tasks.

items.name: var taskTitles: [INSpeakableString]?
items.desc: An array of strings containing the titles of the new tasks.

items.name: var priority: INTaskPriority
items.desc: The priority for the new task.

items.name: var spatialEventTrigger: INSpatialEventTrigger?
items.desc: The location-based trigger to associate with each of the new tasks.

items.name: var temporalEventTrigger: INTemporalEventTrigger?
items.desc: The time-based trigger to associate with each of the new tasks.
